name: Mai Villa Hotel 4 - Dang Van Ngu
address: No.39 Dang Van Ngu Street, Dong Da District, Dong Da District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Conveniently located in Hanoi, Mai Villa Hotel 4 - Dang Van Ngu is a great base from which to explore this vibrant city. The hotel is not too far from the city center: just 05.00 Km away, and it normally takes about 60 minutes to reach the airport. A well-kempt environment and its proximity to Hanoi Medical Institute, Jade Hanoi - Tailoring&Alteration, Vietnam Airforce Museum give to this hotel a special charm.

At Mai Villa Hotel 4 - Dang Van Ngu, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. For the comfort and convenience of guests, the hotel offers 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, car park, babysitting, family room.

Mai Villa Hotel 4 - Dang Van Ngu is home to 25 bedrooms. All are tastefully furnished and many even provide such comforts as television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. When you are looking for comfortable and convenient accommodations in Hanoi, make Mai Villa Hotel 4 - Dang Van Ngu your home away from home.
